00074     virtual void add(unsigned int v, unsigned int w, double amount);
00075     virtual void evaporate(unsigned int v, unsigned int w);
00076     void evaporate_all();

00079 };

00177     virtual std::vector<unsigned int> apply_local_search(const std::vector<unsigned int> &tour) { return tour; }
00178

00192     unsigned int current_vertex();

00194   public:
00195     Ant(unsigned int vertices);

00198     bool operator<(const Ant &ant);
00199     ~Ant();
00200     double get_tour_length();
00201     std::vector<unsigned int> get_vertices();
00202     void reset();
00203     void apply_local_search(OptimizationProblem &op);
00204     virtual void construct_solution(OptimizationProblem &op, PheromoneMatrix &pheromones, double alpha, double beta) {}
00205     void construct_rational_solution(OptimizationProblem &op, PheromoneMatrix &pheromones, double alpha, double beta);
00206     void construct_random_proportional_solution(OptimizationProblem &op, PheromoneMatrix &pheromones, double alpha, double beta);

00232 enum LocalSearchType { NONE, ITERATION_BEST, ALL };

00310 template<class T=Ant, class P=PheromoneMatrix> class AntColony {
00311   private:
00312     void construct_ants_solutions() {
00313       for(typename std::list<T>::iterator it=ants_->begin();it!=ants_->end();it++) {
00314         T &ant = (*it);
00315         ant.construct_solution(*problem_, *pheromones_, alpha_, beta_);
00316       }
00317     }
00318 
00319     void apply_local_search() {
00320       ants_->sort();
00321       if(local_search_ == ITERATION_BEST) {
00322         typename std::list<T>::iterator it_best = ants_->begin();
00323         (*it_best).apply_local_search(*problem_);
00324       } else if(local_search_ == ALL) {
00325         for(typename std::list<T>::iterator it=ants_->begin();it!=ants_->end();it++) {
00326           T &ant = (*it);
00327           ant.apply_local_search(*problem_);
00328         }
00329       }
00330     }
00331 
00332     void reset_ants() {
00333       for(typename std::list<T>::iterator it=ants_->begin();it!=ants_->end();it++) {
00334         it->reset();
00335       }
00336     }
00337 
00338     void update_best_tours_no_ls() {
00339       ants_->sort();
00340       (*best_iteration_no_ls_) = ants_->front();
00341       if(best_so_far_no_ls_->get_tour_length() > best_iteration_no_ls_->get_tour_length()) {
00342         (*best_so_far_no_ls_) = (*best_iteration_no_ls_);
00343       }
00344     }
00345 
00346     void update_best_tours() {
00347       ants_->sort();
00348       (*best_iteration_) = ants_->front();
00349       if(best_so_far_->get_tour_length() > best_iteration_->get_tour_length()) {
00350         (*best_so_far_) = (*best_iteration_);
00351       }
00352     }
00353 
00354     void update_stagnation_measure() {
00355       double average = 0.0;
00356       double standard_deviation = 0.0;
00357       for(typename std::list<T>::iterator it=ants_->begin();it!=ants_->end();it++) {
00358         average += it->get_tour_length();
00359       }
00360       average = average / ants_->size();
00361 
00362       for(typename std::list<T>::iterator it=ants_->begin();it!=ants_->end();it++) {
00363         standard_deviation += pow(it->get_tour_length() - average, 2);
00364       }
00365       standard_deviation *= 1.0 / ants_->size();
00366       standard_deviation = sqrt(standard_deviation);
00367       stagnation_measure_ = standard_deviation / average;
00368     }
00369 
00370     virtual void update_pheromones() = 0;
00371   protected:
00372     P *pheromones_;
00373     double alpha_;
00374     double beta_;
00375     bool compute_stagnation_measure_;
00376     LocalSearchType local_search_;
00377     double stagnation_measure_;
00378     std::list<T> *ants_;
00379     OptimizationProblem *problem_;
00380     T *best_so_far_;
00381     T *best_iteration_;
00382     T *best_so_far_no_ls_;
00383     T *best_iteration_no_ls_;
00384 
00385   public:
00386     AntColony(OptimizationProblem *problem, const AntColonyConfiguration &config) {
00387       problem_ = problem;
00388       ants_ = new std::list<T>(config.number_of_ants, T(problem->get_max_tour_size()));
00389       pheromones_ = new P(problem->number_of_vertices()+1, config.evaporation_rate, config.initial_pheromone);
00390       alpha_ = config.alpha;
00391       beta_ = config.beta;
00392       compute_stagnation_measure_ = config.stagnation_measure;
00393       local_search_ = config.local_search;
00394       stagnation_measure_ = 0.0;
00395       best_so_far_ = new T(problem->get_max_tour_size());
00396       best_iteration_ = new T(problem->get_max_tour_size());
00397       best_so_far_no_ls_ = new T(problem->get_max_tour_size());
00398       best_iteration_no_ls_ = new T(problem->get_max_tour_size());
00399     }
00400 
00401     ~AntColony() {
00402       delete problem_;
00403       delete ants_;
00404       delete pheromones_;
00405       delete best_so_far_;
00406       delete best_iteration_;
00407       delete best_so_far_no_ls_;
00408       delete best_iteration_no_ls_;
00409     };
00410 
00411     void run() {
00412       construct_ants_solutions();
00413       update_best_tours_no_ls();
00414       apply_local_search();
00415       update_best_tours();
00416       if(compute_stagnation_measure_) {
00417         update_stagnation_measure();
00418       }
00419       update_pheromones();
00420       reset_ants();
00421     }
00422 
00423     std::vector<unsigned int> get_best_tour() {
00424       return best_so_far_->get_vertices();
00425     }
00426 
00427     std::vector<unsigned int> get_best_tour_in_iteration() {
00428       return best_iteration_->get_vertices();
00429     }
00430 
00431     double get_best_tour_length() {
00432       return best_so_far_->get_tour_length();
00433     }
00434 
00435     double get_best_tour_length_in_iteration() {
00436       return best_iteration_->get_tour_length();
00437     }
00438 
00439     std::vector<unsigned int> get_best_tour_no_ls() {
00440       return best_so_far_no_ls_->get_vertices();
00441     }
00442 
00443     std::vector<unsigned int> get_best_tour_in_iteration_no_ls() {
00444       return best_iteration_no_ls_->get_vertices();
00445     }
00446 
00447     double get_best_tour_length_no_ls() {
00448       return best_so_far_no_ls_->get_tour_length();
00449     }
00450 
00451     double get_best_tour_length_in_iteration_no_ls() {
00452       return best_iteration_no_ls_->get_tour_length();
00453     }
00454 
00455     double get_stagnation_measure() {
00456       return stagnation_measure_;
00457     }
00458 };
